title: Wang Yi (water polo)
summary: Wang Yi (Chinese: 王毅; pinyin: Wáng Yì; born July 29, 1987 in Shandong) is a Chinese water polo player who was part of the silver medal-winning team at the 2007 World Junior Championship. She also competed at the 2008 and 2012 Summer Olympics. She was the top sprinter at the 2008 Olympics, with 18 sprints won.
